channel.title: 317 GiantScape 317
channel.description:
Source and Client: [url=http://uppit.com/goqgpnhkqp51/GIANTSCAPE.RAR]http://uppit.com/goqgpnhkqp51/GIANTSCAPE.RAR[/url]
This is a server 99% made by me. There was no copying of anyone elses server! I just want some people to try it out and see what they think. I just would like some nice people to try out the server i have made and see how it is.. If you have any suggestions either reply back on here! Or.. Send a Email to [email]gkponder22@gmail.com[/email]
I have made Custom = my own.. no one else.. Custom NPC locations Custom Home
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/avlbsx.png[/img]
Custom NPC Drops One Click On most NPC's Custom NPC hits
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/295cmqb.png[/img]
Custom NPC health Custom NPC movements Custom Shops
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/otkhf7.png[/img]
Custom Teleports Custom Skills..... only 3 right now.. making more Custom Commands Custom NPC's that talk Custom starting items Custom Thieving items Custom XP gained Some Godswords on 317
Source and Client: [url=http://uppit.com/goqgpnhkqp51/GIANTSCAPE.RAR]http://uppit.com/goqgpnhkqp51/GIANTSCAPE.RAR[/url]

Err… 99% != 4.85%

[/quote]I like your rating style.[/quote]
